channel.title: Problem running
channel.description:
i get this when i run
run file-
@echo off TITLE Run "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_21\bin\java.exe" -Xmx500m client highmem pause
error i get -
Exception in thread "Thread-1" java.lang.NullPointerException at sign.signlink.run(signlink.java:136) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619)

item.title: Problem running

item.description:
@Crown2 wrote:

i get this when i run

run file-

@echo off
TITLE Run
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_21\bin\java.exe” -Xmx500m client highmem
pause

error i get -

at sign.signlink.run(signlink.java:136)
